tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Return of Mimmy Blackhorse
programme.desc: An Army forensic pathologist joins forces with Harm, Mac, Bud and Harriet as they try to verify that newly unearthed human remains are those of a heroic Navajo "code-talker" who had been missing since WWII.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Imposter
programme.desc: Harm is held captive by Palmer, a renegade government agent with whom he had crossed swords a few months ago. While Palmer prepares a life mask so he can pass for Harm, he explains his plans to assassinate the key witness in the trial.(n)

programme.title: JAG: To Russia With Love
programme.desc: With evidence that his missing father could still be alive in, Harm convinces the Admiral to give him time off so he can go to Russia. In Moscow, they are questioned by Mark Falcon, the KGB agent who had stolen a list of POW's earlier from Harm.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Gypsy Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to lose the pursuing Russian fighters, Harm's and Mac’s hijacked Mig is shot out of the sky over Siberia.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Act of Terror
programme.desc: When Arab terrorists attach a mine to a US Navy warship in an attempt to sink it, Marine guards are able to kill one and capture the other, even after the mine explodes, killing two sailors.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Black Jet
programme.desc: Harm and Mac are sent to Teheran, Iran to represent a Navy flier whose Stealth jet crashed in Iran due to a major mechanical failure.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.sub-title: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.desc: When poachers almost kill a pregnant endangered deer, Team Scorpion recreates the animal's womb to try to save it and its baby's life. Also, Happy and Toby discuss the future of their family.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Nuke Kids on the Block
programme.desc: While decommissioning an old nuclear missile, a simple accident causes Team Scorpion to endure exposure to toxic vapor while trying to prevent the nuke from detonating.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Sci Hard
programme.desc: While attending a tech convention, Team Scorpion is taken hostage by a group attempting a virtual heist.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Queen Scary
programme.desc: At Halloween, Team Scorpion takes on a case to prove the existence of ghosts on the Queen Mary but find an all-too-real disaster when they locate a 'ghost ship' on a deadly collision course.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Go With the Florence
programme.desc: While tracking a device that can prevent a nuclear meltdown through the Los Angeles sewers, Walter learns the nuances of listening and not offering advice to Paige.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Faire is Foul
programme.desc: For Sylvester's birthday, Team Scorpion visits a renaissance festival, but the revelry is cut short when a group tries to rob a nearby police evidence locker.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bad Moon
programme.desc: As a full moon hangs over the city, the rookies are unnerved by a series of strange occurrences. While investigating the theft of three severed heads, Andy and Swarek pick up the trail of a mentally unstable man who has stopped taking his medication.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart & Sparks
programme.desc: As 15 Division recovers from the shooting of Det. Luke Callaghan, a series of arsons culminates in the torching of a laundromat – and the rookies are forced to confront their own burning issues.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Stung
programme.desc: Using a local car dealership, 15 Division runs a sting operation to crack down on suspects with outstanding warrants. One of the criminals they capture tries to bargain for a lighter sentence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: In Plain View
programme.desc: When a police informant is found murdered, 15 Division sets its sights on finding a weak link in the notoriously brutal East Jameson gang. Andy has to work closely with Detective Jo Rosati, a woman who seems far too interested in Andy’s fiancé, Luke.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: When a woman gets brutally attacked in the same manner as deceased rookie cop Zoe Martinelli. Det. Luke Callaghan is convinced that it’s the same suspect.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Keithley Bus Museum
programme.desc: Once an old foundry, this large old building houses vehicles from a bygone era that are said\nto still contain passengers whose destination has never ended.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Rowleys House
programme.desc: The team head to the centre of Shrewsbury and a large building that is all but empty.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Fleece Inn
programme.desc: This old pup in the heart of West Yorkshire is said to be one of the Most Haunted places in\nEngland.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Judges Lodgings Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette heads to Presteigne, Mid Wales and the famous Judges Lodgings, were courts were\nheld, people imprisoned and Judges stayed, but it also holds many a secret.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Judges Lodgings Part 2
programme.desc: Most Haunted continues its investigation into the Judges Lodgings where the team seem to\nbe under attack and something is trying to get through a door…but what?(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Old House
programme.desc: This week Yvette Fielding takes her Most Haunted team to Coalville and a house that is\nsurrounded by mystery. The team seem to disturb the rest of some of its long-term\nresidence as they battle through a night of terror.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Mark Twain House
programme.desc: TAPS is called to the former home of one of the world's most famous authors in order to investigate a series of startling paranormal occurrences.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Civil War Spirits
programme.desc: The site of the bloodiest battle of the Revolutionary War sets the stage for an unforgettable investigation by TAPS.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Pearl Harbor Phantoms
programme.desc: For the first time ever, TAPS travels to Hawaii to explore one of America's most sacred settings, Pearl Harbor. They are joined in their investigation of the Pacific Aviation Museum by Destination Truth's Josh Gates.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Coroner's Case
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Shreveport, Louisiana where the employees and owner of the Rendall Building are experiencing terrifying paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 5
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: An Affirming Flame
programme.desc: Dylan protects the Andromeda from mercenaries while Beka starts to wonder if they are fighting for the wrong side.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan finds a space station full of kids who believe he is there to bring peace by killing their enemies.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: D Minus Zero
programme.desc: The Andromeda crew is still learning how to work together as they are attacked by the Restorers.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Double Helix
programme.desc: The Andromeda gets involved in a feud between a Than planet and a Nietzschean colony.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Angel Dark, Demon Bright
programme.desc: A slipstream sends the Andromeda back in time to just before the Commonwealth fell. The crew must intervene to preserve history.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Answering a distress call leads the crew to pick up Beka's brother, now a Wayist, and his friend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.226
programme.desc: A father intervenes, hiring attorneys to aid his son in jail release and custody battles after domestic violence charges. The son denies owing anything. A teenager sues ex-roommates for lease breakage.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.125
programme.desc: Family disputes details and payment for deceased woman's $19,000 funeral after 15-year cancer battle/Ex-boyfriend sued for unpaid credit card charges in her name; cites father's death and hardships.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.76
programme.desc: Breast feeding a child while taking Vicodin is the accusation laid\t\t\t\r\nagainst a woman whose husband is being sued by a former friend\t\t\t\r\nfor an unpaid loan/A man accidentally kicks a female co-worker in the head while goofing around in the office.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.25
programme.desc: Paint-gun player sued for shooting alleged drug addict in head; claims $10 deal/Woman sues ex-friend for car damage during move; he asserts abandonment with video evidence.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.253
programme.desc: A man is suing his ex-girlfriend’s son for allegedly stealing his dog and for purposely ramming his car with his bicycle.\t\t\t\r\nA loan to pay life insurance, the return of property, and alleged harassment are disputed by ex-lovers.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.248
programme.desc: A woman and her mother sue their former friend for furniture return; he claims they owe him a loan. Another woman sues her son's ex-friend's mother for car impound costs.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.26
programme.desc: Intoxicated bride sues friend for face punch at wedding, accused teen claims self-defense/Woman accuses ex of cheating, he defends as moving on; dispute over living room set balance.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.94
programme.desc: A single mother dips into her savings to bail an ex-boyfriend out of jail after he was arrested for not paying child support.A woman sues her granddaughter for money she allegedly borrowed to pay for her prom.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.260
programme.desc: A young woman sues for damages after a catfight at a party. Another woman claims chest contusions from breaking up the fight and sues the man she alleges beat her up.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.128
programme.desc: While deployed in Iraq, a woman claims the father of her child had promised to take care of her car but damaged the vehicle instead/A fifty-dollar loan and unpaid rent land feuding ex-roommates in court.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.72
programme.desc: Teen maid of honor sued for failing wedding duties; new bride's father claims cost of missed event plane ticket. Earthquake interrupts courtroom during ex-lovers' case over stolen money allegedly used for drugs.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.229
programme.desc: A woman denies filing a retaliatory restraining order after finding her ex-fiancé with someone else; accused of kicking his bedroom door. Another woman sued for passing fraudulent check in secret-shopper scam.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Elise and Michelle get into a heated argument that carries over into the next day. In the challenge, the chefs toss fish to collect ingredients. While Barbie annoys her team in punishment, the blue team heads to Vegas for a night of revelry.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Nine all-star chefs compete in a blind taste test challenge, in which they must identify herbs and spices with smashing consequences for their teammates. While one chef guesses, one chef sits in the hot seat and is hit with a mashed potato cannon.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With eight chefs remaining, the red and blue teams battle in a pasta-profit challenge and later go toe-to-toe in a dinner service that features a tense race to the finish.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After Dana goes home, the seven remaining chefs learn that it is black jacket day. Chef Ramsay explains that the chefs will compete in three challenges in order to earn their black jacket.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The all-star black jacket brigade has been revealed and now only five chefs remain. Chef Ramsay calls on some of the biggest all-stars in professional sports for a cooking challenge.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Timmy wants to reconnect with a woman he met on the subway; Jeff and Audrey turn on each other when former friends snub them.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In
programme.desc: Liz temporarily moves in with Jeff and Audrey. Jeff isn't happy with the new guest, but changes his mind when he discovers Liz consistently takes his side against Audrey.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Taking Names
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women that Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast after Jennifer suggests they start riding bikes in the park.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cupcake
programme.desc: Russell gets jealous when Timmy manages to outshine him at his own pick-up game. Adam and Jennifer leave pot-laced cupcakes on the kitchen counter, and an unaware Jeff eats one.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fountain Of Youth
programme.desc: After meeting up with college friends who are no longer into partying, Jeff and Audrey set out to prove that even with a baby on the way, they can still have fun. Meanwhile, Timmy attempts to find Russell's compassionate side.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.sub-title: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.desc: Dog launches a high stake hunt through the desolate and dangerous mountain landscape of western Colorado in pursuit of a gun-loving survivalist with a million dollar bond on his head. Will Dog's plan of using brains over brawn work?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. Dog and Beth make it their mission to both clean up the mess and teach him the fundamentals of bondsmanship.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.sub-title: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.(n)

programme.title: Area Q
programme.desc: After his son disappears a journalist goes to Brazil to investigate, where he discovers close encounter sightings that have taken place in a region known as Area Q, where he may uncover the mystery surrounding his son's disappearance.(n)

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.(n)

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: In 2050, 86-year-old Marjorie has a holographic companion who resembles her dead husband and is programmed to feed her the story of her life. With Lois Smith, Jon Hamm, Geena Davis.(n)

programme.title: One Last Dance
programme.desc: In the wake of tragedy, a renowned NY dance company is on the brink of collapse. After leaving the dance world for good, Travis, Chrissa and Max have one last chance to re-connect with the passion and prove that miracles really can happen.(n)

programme.title: How To Be A Latin Lover
programme.desc: Eugenio Derbez (INSTRUCTIONS NOT INCLUDED) and Salma Hayek head an all-star cast in this hilarious comedy about an aging ladies’ man who learns that love and trust must be earned.(n)

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.sub-title: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.desc: Young archaeologist Jack Hunter refuses to join his mentor, Professor Shaffer, who believes a poem is a coded treasure map, on a relic hunt, until his friend is murdered to steal it. The suspect is a Syrian artifact trader so he flies to Damascas.(n)

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.(n)

programme.title: I'll Be Next Door For Christmas
programme.desc: When 16-year-old Nicky’s long-distance boyfriend decides to visit for the holidays, she’s determined to spare him her family’s over-the-top Christmas obsession, by staging a fake Christmas dinner in the empty house next door...(n)

programme.title: A Christmoose Story
programme.desc: A large moose crashes through the roof of young Max's garage! A moose who talks! A moose who claims to work for Santa!(n)

programme.title: Holiday in Your Heart
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old LeAnn Rimes wants nothing more than to sing at the Grand Ole Opry. She is invited to sing at a Christmas concert on Nashville's famous stage, but upon her arrival, she is faced with a difficult decision.(n)

programme.title: Deadly Patient
programme.desc: When Dr. Hillary Spenser saves the life of Gregory Lipton, he becomes dangerously obsessed with her, threatening the good doctor and all those in her life.(n)

programme.title: Love You To Death
programme.desc: Talented attorney Yasmine Winter freezes in court, and her mistake allows a murderer go free. Her boss orders her to take a sabbatical but secretly, Yasmine plans to use the time away to rebuild the case she just lost.(n)

programme.title: Statute Of Limitations
programme.desc: High school sweethearts break into a home which ends badly. One takes the rap and goes to prison. Twenty-two years later he's out and looking to resume their relationship. Just how far will he go to reunite with his high school love?(n)

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: Renowned editor Maxwell Perkins (Colin Firth) develops a friendship with author Thomas Wolfe (Jude Law) while working on the writer's manuscripts.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: To keep his invalid mother happy, an outlaw forces Lucas and Mark to go along with a masquerade that he is the owner of Lucas's ranch.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas helps his former Army captain, now an undercover federal agent, infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An ex-convict is blamed for a brutal crime despite his claims of rehabilitation.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is out for vengeance when Mark is used as a pawn in a bank robbery scheme.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas shoots a horse thief who turns out to be a member of the Boyle clan. Now Ma Boyle is after him.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Seven condemned murderers escape and take over the town of North Fork.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark finds gold on their property, a fast-talking salesman who tried to sell Lucas a new lightning rod offers instead to buy the ranch's mineral rights.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tracks an escaped prisoner to a town that turns out to be run by the gunman's brother who is notorious for shooting people in the back.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When an outlaw leader lures Marshall Torrance out of town, Only Lucas can stop him from lynching a local man who killed one of the members of his gang.(n)

programme.title: The Amazing Burping Pig
programme.desc: When the Rose family move to California it's particularly hard on 7-year-old Talia, who finds it hard to make new friends. One day she finds a teacup pig with a serious burping problem but fearing her parents won't approve, she keeps him hidden.(n)

programme.title: Cybermutt
programme.desc: The powerful dog Rex is injured by a car while rescuing a young scientist from being run over. Feeling responsible for the condition of Rex the scientist uses his skill as a prosthetics inventor to give the dog a new, super-power body.(n)

programme.title: Magic Beyond Words
programme.desc: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings, as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager, to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.(n)

programme.title: Grace and Goliath
programme.desc: Hollywood big-shot Josh Jenkins sweeps into Belfast to make a movie, but before long his world crashes and he loses everything. Hotel cleaner Lily invites him to stay with her family and gradually the people of this 'strange' city touch his heart forever.(n)

programme.title: Peeples
programme.desc: Sparks - and laughs - fly when Wade Walker (Craig Robinson) crashes the Peeples' annual family reunion in the Hamptons to ask for their daughter's (Kerry Washington) hand in marriage.(n)

programme.title: Bottle Shock
programme.desc: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris". Feat: Chris Pine, Alan Rickman & Bill Pullman.(n)

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: A heart-warming romantic comedy about an ordinary girl who is hired to be the decoy for the most famous bride in the world.(n)

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: The Paris Police recruit the officer of an English ship to help trap counterfeiters by joining them.(n)

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: An unusual relationship develops between a fugitive killer and a runaway orphan on an odyssey across England.(n)

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Now a successful businessman, a former military colonel is surprised in his home by a burglar whom he recognises. The colonel decides to find out why his old acquaintance was forced to turn to crime.(n)

programme.title: The Iron Duke
programme.desc: Following the life of the Duke of Wellington from the Vienna Congress in 1815 to the restoration of the second Bourbon dynasty. After defeating Napoleon, Wellington returns to England, where he is attacked by colleagues in the House of Lords.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Thank You Very Much
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to Germany to find a lost Elvis Presley guitar.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Transformation
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Derek Lloyd go to the Peruvian jungle to look for the Paracelsus scrolls which contain the formula for turning lead into gold.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Flag Day
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Larivee, California to find the Pioneer's Bear Flag.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Emperor's Bride
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are in Moose Bay, Alaska looking for the white jade sarcophagus of a Chinese Empress. Sydney runs into fellow relic hunters Dallas Carter and Kurt Reiner.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Diamond in the Rough
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and rival relic hunter Kurt Reiner attempt to find the lost baseball glove of Jimmy Jonesboro.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: When Mutant X and Genomex are captured on film using their powers, they both have to deal with the reporter who plans to go public with the information.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Shalimar's former boyfriend shows up and is trying to recover a Fabergé Egg that holds a microchip of extraordinary power.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team tries to stop Eckhart from acquiring a rare element, but a thief gets it. The woman who has the ability to make men fall in love with her sets her sights on Brennan.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Summit
programme.desc: Da'an leaves and doesn't being Liam along. Zo'or is frantic as to why Da'an left. Liam wants to help but Zo'or doesn't trust him because he doesn't have a CVI, so Liam agrees to be implanted.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dark Matter
programme.desc: When the mother ship hits dark matter, the ship dos not begin to heal itself. Zo'or is left in an unconscious state and Sandoval takes control. He decides it is time to liberate the Earth from the Taelons.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Keys to the Kingdom
programme.desc: The relic left by Ma'el is stolen from the mother ship. Zo'or threatens to destroy a major city if it isn't returned. Liam believes the final chapters contain information on synthesizing core energy.(n)
